trans-unit.source: Contains information about the content type (such as currency, date, or address) or language construct that determine how text should be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder informasjon om innholdstypen (for eksempel valuta, dato eller adresse) eller language-konstruksjon som bestemmer hvordan teksten skal talte.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the `SayAs` class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den `SayAs` klasse.

trans-unit.source: The properties of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> class are used to get or set the values for the attributes of the `say-as` element in SSML markup.
trans-unit.target: Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>klassen brukes til å hente eller angi verdiene for attributtene for den `say-as` elementet i SSML markup.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A> property uses a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance to inform the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> how to speak the text contained in the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property of a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>Egenskapen bruker en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>forekomst å informere <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>snakke teksten i <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A>egenskapen for <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the `detail` attribute for a `say-as` element in the SSML markup language of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for den `detail` attributt en `say-as` elementet i SSML markup language for en melding.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property gets or sets the value for the Detail property in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen henter eller angir verdien for egenskapen Detail i en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the `format` attribute for a `say-as` element in the SSML markup language of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for den `format` attributt en `say-as` elementet i SSML markup language for en melding.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property gets or sets the value for the Format property in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen henter eller angir verdien for egenskapen Format i en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, a prompt may contain the phrase “The time is `<say-as interpret-as=”time”> 05:00 </say-as>`”.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en ledetekst kan inneholde uttrykket "tidspunktet for `<say-as interpret-as=”time”> 05:00 </say-as>`".

trans-unit.source: In this example, `05:00` could be spoken as ”five o’clock” or “five AM” or “oh five hundred”.
trans-unit.target: I dette eksemplet `05:00` kan talte som "klokken fem" eller "fem AM" eller "nedlasting fem hundre".

trans-unit.source: The Format property allows the value of the `interpret-as` attribute to be extended to specify which time format to speak.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Format tillater verdien for den `interpret-as` attributtet utvidet for å angi hvilken klokkeslettformat snakke.

trans-unit.source: If the value for the `interpret-as` attribute is “time:24hour”, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> speaks “oh five hundred”.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for den `interpret-as` attributtet er "tid:&24;-timers" den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>snakker "nedlasting fem hundre".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: If the value for the `interpret-as` attribute is “time:12hour”, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> speaks “five A M”.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for den `interpret-as` attributtet er "tid:&12; time", den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>snakker "fem en M".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the `interpret-as` attribute for a `say-as` element in the SSML markup language of a prompt.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir verdien for den `interpret-as` attributt en `say-as` elementet i SSML markup language for en melding.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property gets or sets the value for the InterpretAs property in a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen henter eller angir verdien for egenskapen InterpretAs i en <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs>forekomsten.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.SayAs> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.SayAs%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> uses the content type indicated by the InterpretAs property to determine how to render specified text.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>bruker innholdstype som er angitt av egenskapen InterpretAs til å finne ut hvordan du gjengi angitte teksten.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: For example, the name Edgar could be spoken as a name: “My name is Edgar”.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel navnet Edgar kan talte som et navn: "jeg heter Edgar".

trans-unit.source: Or it could be spelled out with letters, as specified with the `interpret-as` attribute in this sentence: “My name is `<say-as interpret-as=”spell-out”> Edgar </say-as>`.”
trans-unit.target: Eller det kan skrives fullt ut med bokstaver, som er angitt med den `interpret-as` attributt i denne setningen: "jeg heter `<say-as interpret-as=”spell-out”> Edgar </say-as>`."

trans-unit.source: In this case, the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> speaks Edgar as “E D G A R”.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>snakker Edgar som "E D G et R".</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
